name: pf2e-ancestries-unleashed-core-ancestries
title: PF2e Ancestries Unleashed - Core Ancestry Options
description: A collection of heritages, feats, and all-new Exemplar Feats made to expand the options available to the core ancestries by Luis Loza & James Beck.
author: Pardack

exemplar.label: Exemplar
exemplar.description: An ancestry feat with the exemplar trait represents ancestral abilities that are particularly powerful. A feat with this trait can be selected with a class feat or an ancestry feat. When using a class feat to select a feat with the exemplar trait, you select the feat in place of the class feat, meeting prerequisites as normal. When using an ancestry feat to select a feat with the exemplar trait, you must be at least twice the level of the feat. For example, you must be at least 12th level to select a 6th level feat with the exemplar trait as an ancestry feat.

half-dwarf.label: Half-Dwarf
half-dwarf.description: This trait indicates feats and abilities associated with half-dwarves

half-gnome.label: Half-Gnome
half-gnome.description: This trait indicates feats and abilities associated with half-gnomess

half-goblin.label: Half-Goblin
half-goblin.description: This trait indicates feats and abilities associated with half-goblins

half-halfling.label: Half-Halfling
half-halfling.description: This trait indicates feats and abilities associated with half-halflings

half-human.label: Half-Humans
half-human.description: This trait indicates feats and abilities associated with half-humans
